TopicsList.Title: Introduction to Programming
TopicsList.Description: Basic concepts and fundamentals of programming, covering topics such as variables, data types, control structures, and functions.

TopicsList.Title: Data Structures
TopicsList.Description: Study of basic data structures including arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Understanding their implementation and usage in solving problems.

TopicsList.Title: Algorithms
TopicsList.Description: Understanding and implementing algorithms for problem-solving. Covering various algorithmic paradigms such as divide and conquer, dynamic programming, and greedy algorithms.

TopicsList.Title: Introduction to Scratch Programming
TopicsList.Description: Introduction to programming using Scratch, a visual programming language that allows the user also to programming with coding. Building simple games and animations.

TopicsList.Title: Introduction to Python Programming
TopicsList.Description: Introduction to programming with Python, a versatile and widely-used language. Explore fundamental programming concepts, emphasizing hands-on coding experiences to build a strong foundation.

TopicsList.Title: Introduction to Java Programming
TopicsList.Description: Embark on your programming journey with Java, a powerful and versatile general-purpose language. Dive into fundamental programming concepts, engaging in practical exercises to lay a robust groundwork for your coding skills.

TopicsList.Title: Introduction to JavaScript Programming
TopicsList.Description: Explore the world of programming through JavaScript, a dynamic and widely-used language for web development. Delve into the essentials of programming, grasping foundational concepts with hands-on exercises to fortify your coding proficiency.

TopicsList.Title: Web Development Basics
TopicsList.Description: Introduction to web development technologies including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Building static web pages and understanding the basics of front-end development.

TopicsList.Title: Excel Macros and VBA
TopicsList.Description: How to automate tasks and create custom functions in Excel using macros and Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) programming language.

TopicsList.Title: Database Design
TopicsList.Description: Principles of designing and managing databases. Covering topics such as database normalization, indexing, and query optimization.

TopicsList.Title: Software Testing Techniques
TopicsList.Description: Methods for ensuring software quality and reliability. Understanding testing levels, types of testing, and test automation.
